state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, head west. That done, try to head south. Following that, venture south. Then, go east. And then, go north. Then, make an attempt to go to the east. If you can do that, take a trip east. Following that, make an attempt to head north. And then, take a trip east. And then, move south. After that, move south. That done, travel west. After that, go west. With that accomplished, take the keycard from the saucepan within the scullery. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Washroom =- Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a washroom. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. > -= Washroom =-0/1
next_state: -= Parlor =- You've entered a parlor. You can see an opened ordinary looking safe right there by you. The safe is empty, what a horrible day! You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Parlor =-0/2
